content.rendered:
Best LG Black Friday deals

As one of the oldest mobile phone manufacturer brands LG have a wide range of handsets available and with our fantastic deals this Black Friday there has never been a better time you get yourself a brand-new LG phone! Their range of beautifully designed handsets blend amazing graphics with LGs pioneering technology to create a phone that is perfect for anyone.

LG G7 ThinQ Black Friday deals

No handset better displays the capabilities and impressive performance of an LG phone than the LG G7 ThinQ. Released in May this year this stylish handset comes with a high definition 6.1 inch screen, 16MP camera, and 128GB memory. LG have managed to expertly blend the sleek new design of the G7 ThinQ with the characteristic LG design features that fans know and love. But the most impressive feature of this handset has to be the way that it seamlessly incorporates LG’s sophisticated artificial intelligence technology to make this a truly smart phone. We love it and we’re confident that you will too!
We are offering this amazing phone on a range of deals with both EE and Vodafone all with unlimited minutes and unlimited texts, and with a variety of data bundles so you can pick the deal that is best for you.
To view our LG G7 ThinQ deals click here now!

LG G6 Black Friday deals

The LG G6 may be a slightly older model but, thanks to LG’s reliable power and performance, it is a still a very desirable handset. Despite its slightly smaller size, the G6 still comes with an impressive 5.7 inch high-definition screen, a 13MP camera, and, combined with a 3000mAh battery so you don’t have to worry about running out of power while you’re on the go, LG have provided a powerful phone that can meet all your needs.
We can offer the LG G6 with both EE and Vodafone with unlimited minutes and unlimited texts, and with our best deals starting from only £20 per month with no upfront cost you can’t go wrong!
To buy the LG G6, click here now!

LG K10 Black Friday deals

Despite it’s age and size the LG K10 still embodies the same powerful performance and processing power that LG handsets are famous for making it perfect for anyone looking for a smartphone for a smart price. The ultra-light and compact K10 originally released in February 2017 still boasts a 5.3 inch high definition display and 13MP camera combined with LG’s distinctive design and innovative technology, proving why LG have earnt their reputation as one of the industries favourite smartphone manufacturers.
The K10 remains one of the company’s most affordable phones and this Black Friday you can get your hands on this remarkable handset for as little as £11 per month with over £100 cashback! We offer deals for this phone with both EE and Vodafone and with a range of data allowances so we’re sure you will be able to find the perfect price plan to suit you.
To get yourself the LG K10 for Black Friday, click here now!

New deals available on our Black Friday page –  discover more now.

Can’t see the deal you want? Click here now to view the full range of LG handsets we have on offer this Black Friday
